gaia::text::LengthFilter Class Reference

This filter will constrain edits not to make the length of the text greater than the specified length. More...

 LengthFilter (int32_t max)
virtual ~LengthFilter ()

Detailed Description

This filter will constrain edits not to make the length of the text greater than the specified length. 

 editor = new EditWidget(this);
 InputFilter* lengthFilter = new LengthFilter(20);
 Vector<InputFilter*> filters;
 filters.push(lengthFilter);
 editor->setFilters(filters.toArray());
